column5: Located on paved road, 5 miles out of Ghostown and 1 mile from national park entrance at the Study butte Rv park--great horned owls, coyotes calling and handmade wind chimes can be heard through out the night.  Private courtyard in process Bath house 30 ft away Hairdryer, towels and organic beauty care products in RV Cotton Linens and Down comforters 3 beds total available--one permanent one in back, one pull down bed above drivers seats and a easy to use sofa bed.
